attributes.action: stop people taking are hard earned money and giving it to the people who wont get off there...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Us as a community do not work together. There are some people in this country who work their most hardest from their first days of talking and actually being able to learn, to pay for those who cant even be bothered to finish high school. Surely that is an incentive to not even learn at all. this is ridiculous,no equality.
